Hospitals from New York to London, Paris struggle in tech outage
content: Health systems worldwide face disruptions as global digital outage leads to cancellations of procedures and reliance on handwritten records. Major hospitals in the US and UK encounter difficulties accessing crucial medical data. Emergency services in New Hampshire temporarily affected. Cyber incident attributed to software update issue causing widespread impact on various sectors.
summary: Health systems worldwide face disruptions as global digital outage leads to cancellations of procedures and reliance on handwritten records. Major hospitals in the US and UK encounter difficulties accessing crucial medical data. Emergency services in New Hampshire temporarily affected. Cyber incident attributed to software update issue causing widespread impact on various sectors.

title: Nguyen Phu Trong, Vietnam's longest-serving party chief, passes away at 80
content: Nguyen Phu Trong, Vietnam's Communist Party chief for 13 years, died at 80. President To Lam assumed his duties. Soviet-educated Trong led since 2011, securing a third term in 2021. Initiated a 2017 anti-corruption campaign, appearing fragile recently. Party must decide Lam's role until 2026 Congress or choose a new candidate.
summary: Nguyen Phu Trong, Vietnam's Communist Party chief for 13 years, died at 80. President To Lam assumed his duties. Soviet-educated Trong led since 2011, securing a third term in 2021. Initiated a 2017 anti-corruption campaign, appearing fragile recently. Party must decide Lam's role until 2026 Congress or choose a new candidate.

title: Violent protest grips Bangladesh over civil service hiring rules: Top developments
content: Bangladesh on Friday announced the imposition of a curfew and the deployment of military forces after police failed to quell days of deadly unrest that has spread throughout the country. "The government has decided to impose a curfew and deploy the military in aid of the civilian authorities," Hasina's press secretary Nayeemul Islam Khan told AFP. He added that the curfew would take immediate effect. Police in the capital Dhaka earlier took the drastic step of banning all public gatherings for the day -- a first since protests began -- in an effort to forestall more violence.
summary: Bangladesh on Friday announced the imposition of a curfew and the deployment of military forces after police failed to quell days of deadly unrest that has spread throughout the country. "The government has decided to impose a curfew and deploy the military in aid of the civilian authorities," Hasina's press secretary Nayeemul Islam Khan told AFP. He added that the curfew would take immediate effect. Police in the capital Dhaka earlier took the drastic step of banning all public gatherings for the day -- a first since protests began -- in an effort to forestall more violence.

title: Riot breaks out in UK's Leeds, bus set ablaze: What led to the unrest?
content: Major riots in Leeds as protesters overturn police vehicle and set double-decker bus on fire. West Yorkshire Police respond to the ongoing incident on Luxor Street in Harehills. Officers relocate agency workers and children to safety as situation escalates.
summary: Major riots in Leeds as protesters overturn police vehicle and set double-decker bus on fire. West Yorkshire Police respond to the ongoing incident on Luxor Street in Harehills. Officers relocate agency workers and children to safety as situation escalates.

title: Trump family's united front shines at RNC with Melania, Ivanka & grandchildren on stage
content: The Trump family presented a united front at the RNC, with Melania and Ivanka joining the former President on stage. Melania's rare public appearance and Ivanka's absence from the campaign announcement raised questions about their future in politics.
summary: The Trump family presented a united front at the RNC, with Melania and Ivanka joining the former President on stage. Melania's rare public appearance and Ivanka's absence from the campaign announcement raised questions about their future in politics.

title: Trump assassination attempt: Father of suspect Thomas Matthew Crooks reportedly called police before incident
content: Investigators are still working to determine the 20-year-old gunman's motive. Some media reports show that he had conducted online searches related to major depressive disorder and the upcoming Democratic National Convention. He had also saved images of various political figures and a member of the British Royal Family.
summary: Investigators are still working to determine the 20-year-old gunman's motive. Some media reports show that he had conducted online searches related to major depressive disorder and the upcoming Democratic National Convention. He had also saved images of various political figures and a member of the British Royal Family.
